title: RSM UK names new employment tax partner and national Fair Pay lead
description: Robson’s appointment comes ahead of new employer regulations being introduced by the Government's Fair Work Agency in April next year.
content:
Accountancy firm RSM UK has appointed Chris Robson as its new employment tax partner and national Fair Pay lead.
Robsons appointment comes ahead of new employer regulations being introduced by the G… [+2646 chars]
